contribution.comment: Worked on the LED_MATRIX, LEDs, and Buttons setup. Getting a better handle on the course material could've made a big difference in the work quality.
Handled setting up the joystick and menu display. Also, took the lead in working on the reports.
Had a solid grasp of threading and collaborated to put together PWM and other project components.
Effectively implemented various game-level algorithms and built upon the work of others to make it more efficient.
